descriptions: Demonstrates no understanding of basic probability concepts.
Struggles to identify probabilities in simple scenarios.
Can identify probabilities in simple scenarios but struggles with more complex situations.
Understands basic probability concepts and can apply them to straightforward problems.
Demonstrates a strong understanding of probability concepts and can apply them to a variety of problems.
Shows a comprehensive understanding of probability concepts and can apply them creatively to solve complex and novel problems.
Unable to calculate expected values.
Attempts to calculate expected values but makes significant errors.
Can calculate expected values in simple scenarios but struggles with more complex calculations involving multiple outcomes.
Accurately calculates expected values in most scenarios.
Consistently calculates expected values accurately and efficiently.
Calculates expected values with accuracy and can explain the implications of the results in decision-making.
Unable to apply expected values to decision-making.
Struggles to connect expected values to real-world decisions.
Can make simple decisions based on expected values but struggles with more complex scenarios.
Uses expected values to make informed decisions in a variety of scenarios.
Analyzes and compares different decisions based on expected values, explaining the reasoning clearly.
Applies expected values to decision-making with sophistication, considering multiple factors and uncertainties.
Unable to communicate the reasoning behind calculations or decisions.
Struggles to explain the process of calculating expected values or justifying decisions.
Can explain the calculations and decisions in a basic way but lacks clarity or detail.
Clearly communicates the process of calculating expected values and justifying decisions.
Communicates calculations and decisions with clarity and provides strong justifications.
Communicates calculations and decisions with exceptional clarity, providing insightful justifications and considering alternative perspectives.
